# requirements.txt can be used to replicate the developer's build environment
# setup.py lists a separate set of requirements that are looser to simplify
# installation
chardet == 3.0.4
cffi == 1.12.2
img2pdf == 0.3.3
pdfminer.six == 20181108
pikepdf == 1.6.5
Pillow >= 6.2.0
pycparser == 2.19
python-xmp-toolkit == 2.0.1
reportlab == 3.5.13
tqdm == 4.32.1
